title: DIC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Manager Posts
description: Digital India Corporation (DIC) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Manager Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech can grab this chance and apply for the DIC Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligibe candidates can apply online before the application ends. If you are looking for more, here is a...
